'''Spiders''' are enemies infrequently found in [[Teyvat]]. They stay on their webs which mask chests and block pathways in corridors.

==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Homing Shot
|desc_1 = Fires projectiles with extremely strong homing properties that deal '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to the player and briefly interrupts them.
* Characters hit by the projectile will also receive a '''50%''' [[Movement Speed]] debuff that lasts for '''3s'''.
* In [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]], 1 Energy will also be drained from the [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]] on hit.
}}

==Locations==
Spiders are found in [[The Chasm (Subregion)|The Chasm]], inside ruins, or in [[Quest Domains]] in these quests:
* ''[[Luhua Landscape]]'', in the ruins guarded by two statues at [[Luhua Pool]]
* ''[[Nine Pillars of Peace]]''
* ''[[The Realm Within]]''
* ''[[Defender of Childhood Dreams]]''
* ''[[Yet the Butterfly Flutters Away]]''
* ''[[The Great Tree]]''

Spiders can also be found during the event [[Lantern Rite Tales]] World Quest, ''[[The Illumiscreen: I]]'', where they are seen guarding the event chests near the [[Shrine of Depths]] by [[Mt. Aocang]].

==Trivia==
*Unlike real spiders, these spiders only have six legs. It also has horns on its head.
